name: Post 1: Introduction to React
title: Easily create your own simple yet highly customizable blog
description: Take full control of your personal brand and privacy by migrating away from the big tech platforms!
body: React is a JavaScript library for building user interfaces. In this post, we will explore the fundamentals of React and how to create dynamic web applications.

name: Post 2: Understanding JavaScript Closures
desc: Deep dive into closures in JavaScript
body: A closure is a function that retains access to its lexical scope, even when the function is executed outside that scope. This post covers the concept of closures and provides practical examples.

name: Post 3: The Power of CSS Grid
desc: How to create complex layouts with CSS Grid
body: CSS Grid is a powerful tool for creating responsive web layouts. This post will walk you through the basics of CSS Grid and how to use it to create modern web layouts.

name: Post 4: Mastering Asynchronous JavaScript
body: Asynchronous JavaScript is a crucial concept for modern web development. In this post, we will dive into async/await, Promises, and how to handle asynchronous operations efficiently.
